text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends Stop tweeting your lies and do your damn job instead of spewing your BS.  Your lies and ineptness has caused more than 120,000 deaths from, and more than 2,000,000 positive cases of, the Coronavirus.  You are the worst president in the last 80 years, at the very least.
